activities: Scarborough & Tweed offers logo merchandise and corporate gifts for our clients, most of whom are global investment banking firms.  We hold items (bags, hats, apparel, desk items, conference giveaways, etc.) in stock that have the client logo on them.  Our clients have us send these items to their employees, clients and conferences.  As part of this service, we generally receive employee/client name, address, email address , phone #.  Some employees order merchandise for personal use, and for those clients, we also get credit card number.
recoursemech: Arbitration or the US legal system; EU data protection authorities
